channel.title: 508 Male & Female Character Models
channel.description:
99.9 Credits to Jagex for the models , 00.1 Credits to me for finding it :) if it's unfair Credits tell me so OK? I'm not completely sure that the model is same size i ripped it from RSMV that already had about 2,000 models in it and i didn't remove the clothes because I'm lazy sorry you can do it yourself. [size=14pt]DOWNLOAD[/size] Female : http://www.mediafire.com/?b56zt5y42z9uuh2 Male : http://www.mediafire.com/?0y78j2mj4kq5eeu
[size=10pt]Pictures[/size] Male [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ch1c8x.jpg[/img] Female [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25gwkth.jpg[/img]

item.title: 508 Male & Female Character Models
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:396278”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=493448.msg3608341#msg3608341 date=1306326719]

Both the male and female body parts are in models 1-200 somewhere, they come as separate models (upper head, chin, torso and arms, occasionally separate, legs, feet, and hands). You have to find all the parts and piece them together in metasequoia to form a full character.

You can do that for me yer?
[/quote]
I see no need for a 508 character model as there are very few people that model for 508s (as far as I know), but I put together a 317 character a long time ago, here.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,393017.0.html[/quote]
But i already have a 317 male model, i want a 508 but no one seems to have the right model.

Read full topic

You can do that for me yer? ;)[/quote]
I see no need for a 508 character model as there are very few people that model for 508s (as far as I know), but I put together a 317 character a long time ago, here.

item.title: 508 Male & Female Character Models
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:396278”][quote author=Infinity Death link=topic=493448.msg3607889#msg3607889 date=1306282983]

Definitely not the proper character models for characters, notice the arms are majorly bowed and long

That’s how it’s supposed to look if you add a sword in that position it should be in the right place , try that out and notify me if it worked
[/quote]

… those are npc models, not character models, a sword is not going to fit in their hands.[/quote]
Well since you posted that i will look through rsmv tomorrow to see if i can find all the 508 character parts and piece them together

Read full topic
